supaporn thanks for the report.

As your request about the template was "buried" in your report I shall try to answer unless it is not by a Moderator.

Follow this link it tells you what to do http://auxxxreviews.com/forum/f55/ex...t-review-9481/  and some examples.

Basically it is this format (according to my interpretation):

Person's Name : Service provider

Establishment : Name or if no name the address of facility

Date of Visit : DD/MM/YYYY

Contact Details: Address/Weblink/Telephone : 

Hours of Business : HHam till HHpm

Rates : $'s an hour  aand per 30 min

Age : in years or estimate if not known!

Size/shape : Size cup, shape, if enhanced, looks

Nationality or Ethnicity : Race

Services Provided : CBJ/BBBJ, DATY, FS, Anal, Kissing/DFK etc

Value for money/recommend? : Good/OK/bad etc in your opinion

My experience/comments : Describe your session in your own words.

Hope this helps.

And so it comes to this..

A worthwhile forum thrives and evolves through its membership by giving and taking of information, intel and subject matter.. no matter how trivial the review maybe.. Even if you have seen the PWL a few times..
